data.title: Meta removes 1.6 billion fake accounts in Q4 2025, highest ever
data.snippet: Meta's quarterly transparency report reveals record-breaking enforcement against inauthentic accounts, with the majority originating from coordinated networks.

data.title: AI-generated spam accounts flood X/Twitter with coordinated political messaging
data.snippet: Researchers identify networks of AI-operated accounts posting synchronized political content designed to manipulate public opinion ahead of elections.

data.title: India's election commission flags 50,000 inauthentic social media accounts ahead of state polls
data.snippet: The Election Commission coordinates with platforms to remove tens of thousands of fake accounts spreading electoral misinformation.

data.title: YouTube removes 8 million spam channels in largest-ever enforcement action
data.snippet: YouTube's anti-spam systems detect and remove millions of channels uploading recycled, misleading, and artificially boosted content.

data.title: Telegram bot networks sell fake engagement at industrial scale
data.snippet: Investigation reveals Telegram-based services offering millions of fake likes, followers, and comments across all major social platforms for minimal cost.
